result.arabic_text: وَلِلَّهِ ٱلۡمَشۡرِقُ وَٱلۡمَغۡرِبُۚ فَأَيۡنَمَا تُوَلُّواْ فَثَمَّ وَجۡهُ ٱللَّهِۚ إِنَّ ٱللَّهَ وَٰسِعٌ عَلِيمٞ
result.translation: 115. Ayro как tawqe gambii kee Ayro kak korta gambiiy ken Nammayih fanal tanim inkih Yalli-le, tokkel Salaatah eile Afkuninnaanih gambil, tokkel too arac kay qhiblatay usuk Siinik edde leeda kinni, diggah Yalli isi Naqoosah farakka-le racmat leeh ken Niyaayit tanim yaaxigi kinniih tukaak maqellitta.
